and embellishments note my original pattern shows tassels with little heads on them the actual hat does not have these heads to make the tassels without the head see note after tassel instructions knitter s choice which to do make 4 small tassels see next page i used a 2 ½ inch piece of cardboard and did 30 wraps for each tassel sew a tassel onto the end of each earflap i-cord with red tightly wrap the i-cord above the tassel for about 1-¼ to 1-½ inches i wrapped three layers of red to get the thickness needed put the yarn tails through a needle and secure them by pulling them underneath the wraps it may take a bit of practice to get the wraps the way you want them for top tassels make a length of i-cord about 10 inches long add tassels to each end as described above fold the i-cord in half and mark the center sew to top of hat at the center whew it s done headless tassels make tassels as described but stop after step 4 do not wrap the tassel use the ties to sew the tassel to
